class MetasploitModule < Msf::Encoder

 ➊ Rank = NormalRanking

        'Name'             => 'Bash Base64 Encoder',

        'Description'      => %q{

        'Author'           => 'An Ethical Hacker',

  ➌ def encode_block(state, buf)

         unicode = Rex::Text.to_unicode(buf)

         base64 = Rex::Text.encode_base64(unicode)

         cmd = "base64 -d <<< #{base64} | sh"

         return cmd
